name: Dave's Dream
description:
Dave's dev dream of making an amazing game for the #MeatlyJam gamejam gets squashed when his boss finds out what he's been doing at work all this time.

Now depressed, Dave is lost in his own dream.

Controls:

Control with mouse
R: Restart
ESC: Back to main menu

This game is inspired by films like Groundhog Day, Edge of Tomorrow and Back to the Future. It was produced in 2 days for #MeatlyJam, using assets from http://www.meatlyjam.com/gameassets.

WARNING: The game contains depiction of suicide, so be careful if you're sensitive about the subject.
